org.qcri.rheem.core.plan.executionplan

Class ExecutionPlan

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qcri.rheem.core.plan.executionplan.ExecutionPlan

  • public class ExecutionPlan
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an executable, cross-platform data flow. Consists of muliple PlatformExecutions.

      • expand

        public void expand(ExecutionPlan expansion)
        The given instance should build upon the open Channels of this instance. Then, this instance will be expanded with the content of the given instance.
        Parameters:
        expansion - extends this instance, but they are not overlapping

      • getOpenInputChannels

        public java.util.Collection<Channel> getOpenInputChannels()
        Collects all Channels that are copies. We recognize them as Channels that are open.

        Implements various sanity checks. Problems are logged.

        Creates a new instance from the given ExecutionTaskFlow.
        Parameters:
        executionTaskFlow - should be converted into an ExecutionPlan
        stageSplittingCriterion - defines where to install ExecutionStage boundaries
        Returns:
        the new instance
